hero.title: An aspiring developer in rise
hero.subtitle: is ready for everything!
hero.description: Hi, my name is Mert. I'm a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a developer who can do great things both in frontend, backend or both; you can count on me to do it.

items.title: Javascript
items.description: I first learned about this programming language at the start of the program. It's how I mostly made this portfolio in basics.

items.title: React.Js
items.description: I learned about this programming language after Javascript, HTML and CSS. It's a more advanced version of Javascript where frontend became more dynamic.

items.title: Redux
items.description: I learned about this topic after React. It allows the React programs to be more immutable and states to be much more managable.

profile.title: Profile
about: I have been interested in programming stuff since I was young, by seeing how some programs like games worked.
I did try to improve myself on backend and frontend, but I wasn't as efficient until joining Workintech's Full Stack Pro program. Since then, I feel more confident in myself and ready for work.

items.title: Technological Foods Website
items.description: A simple website I made using HTML and CSS about ordering a pizza. It became a staple for a future project that I improved with React.

items.title: Login E2E Testing
items.description: A project I made using Cypress' E2E testing procedure where I wrote various tests about logging into a site.

items.title: Technological Foods: Order a Pizza!
items.description: The improved version of the HTML/CSS website that I improved using various frontend tools, such as React, Axios, Cypress and Tailwind. You can order a pizza of your liking here!
